imdb.plot outline: Yaz, a Russian internet celebrity, whose real name is Viktor Goncharenko travels around the country and looks for unusual, even extreme recipes. His mixer is a Kamaz truck, his pancakes are 2 meters in diameter, he cooks a bathtubful of food at a time. There is no culinary experiment that he has not tried to reproduce. Whatever he cooks, he finishes the meal to the last crumb so he always wins in the battle: Yaz vs. Food.
imdb.title: Yaz vs. Food
plot: The internet celebrity Viktor Goncharenko (Yaz) goes on an extreme culinary journey. He travels around Russia and realizes his wildest cooking dreams.::Vadim Levin

Yaz, a Russian internet celebrity, whose real name is Viktor Goncharenko travels around the country and looks for unusual, even extreme recipes. His mixer is a Kamaz truck, his pancakes are 2 meters in diameter, he cooks a bathtubful of food at a time. There is no culinary experiment that he has not tried to reproduce. Whatever he cooks, he finishes the meal to the last crumb so he always wins in the battle: _Yaz vs. Food_ (qv).::Vadim Levin
